options.name: Expressive
options.description: You are no stranger to expressing yourself, be that through art or strong emotions. Gain +1 skill with expression. Additionally, once per day, you can use an expression check instead of persuasion to appeal to someone's emotions.

options.name: Insightful
options.description: You are especially insightful and know when someone is hurting. Gain +1 skill with insight. Additionally, once per day, you can substitute a medicine check with your insight skill if it is being used on an ally.

options.name: Downtime Action : Community Outreach
options.description: You spend time embedding yourself in the community, offering help where you can by volunteering your time or services. This fulfilling work can help make local connections and restore your resolve. An insight check of an 6-9 is midly successful and restores 2 resolve, while a 10 or higher is very successful and restores 5 resolve. On a perfect check, you restore your resolve and all the resolve of the individuals you interacted with in your outreach.

options.name: Daily Action : Plea
options.description: When an ally is at 0 resolve, you can make a plea in a desperate attempt to keep them going. Roll an expression check; for each dice you roll over 6, they gain one resolve.

options.name: Action : Read Emotions
options.description: You make an insight check and attempt to read the emotions or state of a creature by making an insight check, with the quality of the information learned dependent upon the result. If the creature is not a beast or humanoid, roll with a penalty dice. The information revealed may involve desires, mood or state of mind.
